Text: That's tonight's VIP. You have to serve them tonight and serve them well.
Right. I'll be sure to treat the giant shadow baby that's crying well.
Hey, no namecalling our VIP! You should be nicer to the important people in your death.
Look what you've done now. The VIP was right there and you ignored them! You better not mess it up next time!
Ah, it's about the time of day for me! Good job etcetera etcetera. I have to go torture some other souls. Be good while I'm gone!
Great. I guess I'll just count ceiling tiles again until he shows back up.
Motherf-
I mean... uh. Hello, welcome. We're closed right now but I hope your meal was satisfactory?
I can still hear the crying, but it sounds far away... What's going on now?
Why won't this damn crying stop?! I thought my son could never shut up, but this is on another level...
My son... I wonder if he misses me. Now he's something like 10 years old. Or was it 12?
Ugh, my ears are ringing... Something about this room is different. It feels almost nostalgic...
What the hell?! What is this room? And why did everything get bigger? Or, maybe...
I know this room. Did he want me to find this? Is this some kind of test?
thump thump
That noise. There's something else here. Could it be..?
THUMP THUMP THUMP
The ground is shaking... Whatever that is, it's coming closer!
Satan, you piece of- why am I not back in the diner?!
What was all that? How'd I get back to the diner...?
Where did you go off to?
This is your realm, shouldn't you know?
I'm a busy guy. You'll need to go upstairs if you're looking for perfect omniscience.
Huh?
Just keep making food, food man. That's all you need to know, right?
